name: Our Name Is Mercer
description:
This was made for the GBJAM9.

I have always wanted to make something that relates the story of Mercer from the novel "Do Androids Dream Of Electric Sheep?" by Philip K Dick. Now, I have. Direction buttons to move Mercer.

ENTER is the "Start" button

No Sound.

The game was made today 27th September 2021.
